data.actual_result: Input box doesn't allow 2FA code to be entered
data.expected_result: Code is entered, server is able to be deleted
data.short_description: Cannot enter 2FA code when deleting server
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure you have 2FA (2-Factor Authentication) enabled - Go to Server Settings -> Delete Server and follow normal steps - Attempt to enter 2FA code
